text: @JasonSCampbell But Covid19 is decimating senior care homes (including many workers) and it can hit younger people hard as well. 20% of the NYPD were out sick! Also, the weak and elderly might be those affected in the first wave. We could have a second wave in the fall/winter that hits harder.
